title: Multisource representation learning for pediatric knowledge extraction from electronic health records
details: M Li, X Li, K Pan, A Geva, D Yang, SM Sweet… - npj Digital Medicine, 2024
abstract: Abstract Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems are particularly valuable in pediatrics due to high barriers in clinical studies, but pediatric EHR data often suffer from low content density. Existing EHR code embeddings tailored for the general …

title: Survival models and longitudinal medical events for hospital readmission forecasting
details: S Davis, R Greiner - BMC Health Services Research, 2024
abstract: Background The rate of 30-day all-cause hospital readmissions can affect the funding a hospital receives. An accurate and reliable readmission prediction model could save money and increase quality-of-care. Few projects have explored …
